attributes.action: That the Commons calls for a Vote of Confidence in Kenneth Clarke MP
attributes.additional_details: That in view of Mr Clarke's involvement with Bildeberg whilst serving in a cabinet post, in view of his role as a trustee of the organisation, and the clear involvement of the British government in allowing British soil to be used for holding the Bilderberg Annual Conference, and the provision of security funded by the taxpayer, that the Commons calls for a Vote of Confidence in Mr Clarke, unless he reveals in full the content of his discussions with the Bildeberg Group, while patently representing the democratically elected British government.
